name: Wildlife Simulator (Buburito Games)
description:
Controls:

Left click to select a tile, space to manually spawn a random animal.

WASD / Arrow keys / Right click and drag  to move around the camera.

Left shift: Speed up camera movement.

Ctrl: Slow down camera movement.

Scroll wheel: Zoom in / out.

Enter: Force actions for all animals (buggy lol)

Types of Animals: Animal
ClassDietSheep
PreyGrass
RabbitPreyGrassCapybaraPreyFishBirdPreyFishRatPreyCorpsesWolfPredatorMeatSnakePredatorMeatBearApex Predator
